list.name: Stage begin events
list.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_STATE_EVENT AND state:BEGIN AND application_id:$application_id AND application_name.keyword:$application_name AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Stage end events
list.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_STATE_EVENT AND state:END AND application_id:$application_id AND application_name.keyword:$application_name AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Added
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND state:ADDED AND application_id:$application_id AND application_name.keyword:$application_name AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Removed
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND state:REMOVED AND application_id:$application_id AND application_name.keyword:$application_name AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Blacklisted/Unblacklisted
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND NOT state:REMOVED AND NOT state:ADDED AND application_id:$application_id AND application_name.keyword:$application_name AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

panels.content: Container metrics/JVM detailed metrics for this app available here: [Yarn Application Dashboard for $application_id](/dashboard/db/garmadon-yarn-application?orgId=1&var-datasource=$datasource&var-username=All&var-framework=All&var-application_name=All&var-application_id=$application_id&var-component=All&var-container_id=All&var-hostname=All&var-uri=All)

styles.linkTooltip: Click to display Spark Stages Detailled for this stage

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_STATE_EVENT AND application_id:$application_id AND application_name.keyword:$application_name AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

styles.linkTooltip: Click to display Spark Executor Detailled for this executor

panels.content:
Executor run time: Time the executors spends actually running all tasks of the stage (including fetching shuffle data)

Jvm gc time: Amount of time the JVM spent in garbage collection while executing the stage 

Executor deserialize time: Time taken on the executors to deserialize all tasks of the stage

Result serialization time: Amount of time spent serializing all tasks of the stage result

panels.description: This only includes the time blocking on shuffle input data. For instance if block B is being fetched while the task is still not finished processing block A, it is not considered to be blocking on block B.
